quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First stop, go to the west. Following that, take a trip south. Then, take a trip south. Following that, venture east. Then, attempt to venture east. And then, make an attempt to venture east. After that, move north. Then, venture west. Then, attempt to go north. Next, take the mat from the box. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in the shower. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box here.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a bench. The bench is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bench you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. An ordinary one.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_1]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookhouse.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a chamber. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_2]On the mantelpiece you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a dish-pit.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a freezer.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The freezer is empty![end if] You can see a Microsoft limited edition box. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The Microsoft limited edition box contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The Microsoft limited edition box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the scullery. You can barely contain your excitement.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You're now in a bedroom.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a study.

 You can make out a toolbox.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You smell an interesting smell, and follow it to a stand. The stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bedchamber. A typical one.



There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a kitchenette. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a cubicle. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] case in the room.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The case contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The case is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just come into a closet.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a parlor. An ordinary one. The room is well lit.

 You can see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fresh laundry scented safe here.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The fresh laundry scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The fresh laundry scented safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can make out a couch. [if there is something on the s_4]On the couch you can see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the couch.[end if] You can see a bed. [if there is something on the s_5]On the bed you can see [a list of things on the s_5]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a bar. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can make out a Henderson's safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The Henderson's safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The Henderson's safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You're now in the basement. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_6]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But there isn't a thing on it. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if] Hey, want to see a workbench? Look over there, a workbench. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]The workbench appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've entered a lounge.

 You can make out a recliner. The recliner is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the recliner you can make out [a list of things on the s_8], so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You see a mantle. [if there is something on the s_9]On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_9]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You're now in the studio.

 You make out a type 3 chest.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The type 3 chest contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The type 3 chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You have fallen into a salon. Not the salon you'd expect. No, this is a salon.

 You see a shelf. You wonder idly who left that here. The shelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_10] On the shelf you make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An usual one.

 You can make out [if c_10 is locked]a locked[else if c_10 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] usual looking safe close by.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Oh, great. Here's a coffer.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_11].[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a canteen.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, make an effort to venture west. Then, head south. With that accomplished, travel south. After that, go east. Then, travel east. With that done, attempt to travel east. After that, venture north. With that over with, make an attempt to go to the west. Next, go north. Next, take the mat from the box. And if you do that, you're the winner!
